configFirebaseDescription: Set a Firebase project instance. More in documentation.
firebaseAuthDomain: Auth domain: Firebase auth domain. Example: 'my-project-11.firebaseapp.com'.
firebaseDatabaseURL: Database URL: Firebase database URL. Example: 'my-project-11.firebaseapp.com'.
firebaseProjectId: Project id: Firebase project id. Example: 'my-project-11'.
firebaseStorageBucket: Storage Bucket: Firebase Storage bucket (storageBucket). Example: 'my-project-11.appspot.com'.
messagingSenderId: Messaging sender id: Firebase messaging sender id (messagingSenderId). Example:'123456789012'.
firebaseProvider: Provider auth: Firebase auth provider. if it's public, leave empty.
firebaseGetDatabaseDescription: Get a database from Firebase. More in documentation.
firebaseOptionalAppName: App name: Optional App name (empty means default app).
firebaseAddDataDescription: Overwrite an data object into path of Firebase database. This function clean the original content from path. More in documentation.
firebaseDatabase: Firebase database: return of Get database function.
firebaseData: Data: Content data to add on path.
firebaseAddOnEventDescription: Execute the statements when receive some change from realtime database on specified path. More in documentation.
firebaseAddOnceEventDescription: Execute the statments once. Example: read initialized variables. More in documentation.
firebaseUpdateDataDescription: Update data from a specified path on database. More in documentation.
firebasePushDataDescription: Append an node on specified path. More in documentation.
